mapper.select: select d.meter_no as meterNo, d.price as price, m.user_no as userNo, m.add_des as address, m.customer_name as userName, sum(ifnull(d.credit_amt,0)) as amount, sum(ifnull(d.quantity,0)) as usegas, d.use_date as date from daily_record d left join meter m on d.meter_id=m.meter_id where 1=1 and d.use_date >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' and d.use_date <= '2021-11-20 23:59:59' and m.org_id like '000102%' group by d.meter_no, d.price, m.user_no, m.add_des, m.customer_name, d.use_date order by d.meter_no,d.use_date
